plugin.name: DynamicPlaylists3
plugin.title: Dynamic Playlists 3
plugin.desc: ++++ PLEASE READ!!! ++++ Dynamic Playlists 3 uses a different name now. Please *uninstall* any *previous* version of Dynamic Playlists *3* FIRST. Then install the new version of 'Dynamic Playlist 3' from the LMS main repository / plugin library (LMS - Settings - Plugins). And don't forget to delete this repository URL from LMS - Settings - Plugins. Sorry for the inconvenience.
plugin.creator: AF
